>>38011195

"What? Did he raid your guild bank?" Aelriss asks. "Do you even know how far he can teleport?"

"It can't be anything like that. Hasn't he been funneling Gems from the players his guild members kill?" Nel picks himself up. "If he's in charge of a guild of Nameless assholes, they can't even use the Gems anyway, so..."

"Yes, but..." Liza begins.

> [[ Ascheritte: 3 / 35 HP ]]

"Uh, Liza." You raise a hand. "Theory later? I'm dying."

"You, uh." Liza folds her arms, wincing at your state. "You look great. What are you talking about?"

"Well, Guardian?" Donnel asks. "You were saying?"

"It's stupid, never mind. I'm just... pissed." She sighs, planting a hand on her forehead. "Fuck, how am I even going to explain this?"

> "You could start by helping clean up the rest of the rioting."
> Ask Liza about Crimson Wings.
> Ask Liza about another of the guilds.
> Ask about joining the Guardians.
> Other.

Archiving. Will probably do one last update.
